name: set-csharp-assembly-version
description: Patches all discovered AssemblyInfo.cs files with the supplied build number
helpMarkDown: This task should be sequenced directly after sources have been downloaded to ensure proper inclusion in build/release
author: IowaComputerGurus, Inc.

inputs.name: sourceDirectory
inputs.label: Source Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory to traverse looking for AssemblyInfo.cs

inputs.name: assemblyVersion
inputs.label: Assembly Version #
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version number to set.    Must be in the format #.#.# or #.#.#.#

messages.InvalidVersion: Supplied version number %s does not match format of #.#.# or #.#.#.#
messages.UpdatingVersion: Updating target version number to 4 part version number
messages.UnableToFindVersion: Unable to find required version declaration in file %s
